Tests ReportingApiEndpointsChangedForOrigin events.

Endpoints updated:
{
    endpoints : [
        [0] : {
            groupName : csp
            url : https://localhost/reporting-endpoint
        }
        [1] : {
            groupName : default
            url : https://reports.example/default
        }
        [2] : {
            groupName : main-endpoint
            url : https://reports.example/main
        }
    ]
    origin : https://127.0.0.1:8443
}
